text: tavada “mage janataveni! oba obage margayehi (obage karanavan) karamin sitinu. mamada (mage margayehi mage karanavan) karamin sitinnemi. avaman gena dena danduvama kavurunva nam pæmina sendu vanu ætda? boru kiyanna kavarekda? yanna oba ita ikmanin dæna gannehuya. (ema kalaya) oba balaporottuven sitinu. niyata vasayenma mamada oba samaga (eya) balaporottuven sitinnemi” (yayida pævasuveya)
